mapper.select: select * from Doc_DocPath where fFileID = #{fFileID,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and fVersion = (select max(fVersion) from Doc_DocPath where fFileID = #{fFileID,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.insert: insert into Doc_DocPath (fID, fFileID, fFilePath, fFileSize, fVersion, fAddTime, version) values (#{fID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fFileID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fFilePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fFileSize,jdbcType=FLOAT}, #{fVersion,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fAddTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update Doc_DocPath set fFileID = #{fFileID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fFilePath = #{fFilePath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fFileSize = #{fFileSize,jdbcType=FLOAT}, fVersion = #{fVersion,jdbcType=INTEGER}, version = #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER} where fID = #{fID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
